attributes.action: Carry out a full audit of all MPs expenses within the period of the statute of limitations, with a view to reclaiming from all MPs any sums which are contrary to the spirit of the existing expenses policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These sums would include a focus on 
Housing - sale - resale and/or purchase of multiple homes funded by the tax payer, in the premise that if you didn't pay for it and it wasn't a  gift then it doesn't belong to you.

Staffing: that all MPs employment processes are scrutinised to ensure that all appointments are made following an appropriate recruitment process and that salaries are commensurate with the role and experience of the post holder.

That the fees office staffing structures and policies are redesigned to ensure that tax payer monies are protected and correctly accounted for, producing audited accounts.
